title: PUCSL announces scheduled power cuts
body_lines: No power cuts tomorrow in view of May Day and 3 May due to Ramadan
Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) yesterday announced that power cuts will not be imposed on the May Day and on 3 May in view of the Ramadan festival.
However, three-hour and 20-minute power cuts will be imposed on 2 and 4 May countrywide.
All areas will experience a two-hour power disruption between 9 a.m. and 5.30 p.m. and one-hour and 20-minutes between 5 p.m. and 9.30 p.m.
Area CC will be imposed a three-hour power cut between 6 a.m. and 9.20 a.m.
